p:
When a text contains lists, they can be encoded with the following elements:
The list element can identify any kind of list; the@formattribute can be used to specify whether the list is ordered, unordered etc. Each item in the list is encoded with the li element. The@ncan be used to record a label for a list item, as in the following example: Occasionally, lists have headers or titles, which can be encoded with head:
